description:
From young, Mu Bai has been very hard working and has very good results. He has very strong rivalry towards Mo Fan because despite being academically better, Mo Fan always ends up being the person everyone in their age group follows including Mu Ning Xue.
Mu Bai has been outclassed by Mo Fan and Mu Ning Xue greatly, but he is not to be underestimated as one must remember that both Mo Fan and Mu Ning Xue possess items that helps them improve their cultivation speed while Mu Bai is depending solely on his own talent and hard work.
name: Mu Bai
